DocAttribute.Name: CoordinateSpaceDimension
DocAttribute.Documentation: The integer dimension count of the coordinate space modeled in a geometric representation context.

DocAttribute.Name: Precision
DocAttribute.Documentation: <EPM-HTML>Value of the model precision for geometric models. It is a double value (REAL), typically in 1E-5 to 1E-8 range, that indicates the tolerance under which two given points are still assumed to be identical. The value can be used e.g. to sets the maximum distance from an edge curve to the underlying face surface in brep models. </EPM-HTML>

DocAttribute.Name: WorldCoordinateSystem
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Establishment of the engineering coordinate system (often referred to as the world coordinate system in CAD) for all representation contexts used by the project.
Note  it can be used to provide better numeric stability if the placement of the building(s) is far away from the origin. In most cases however it would be set to origin: (0.,0.,0.) and directions x(1.,0.,0.), y(0.,1.,0.), z(0.,0.,1.).

DocAttribute.Name: TrueNorth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Direction of the true north relative to the underlying coordinate system as established by the attribute WorldCoordinateSystem. It is given by a direction within the xy-plane of the underlying coordinate system. If not given, it defaults to the positive direction of the y-axis of the WorldCoordinateSystem.

DocAttribute.Name: HasSubContexts
DocAttribute.Documentation:
The set of IfcGeometricRepresentationSubContexts that refer to this IfcGeometricRepresentationContext.
